definition: to send/to devote/to deliver/to cause/to convey
life/fate/order or command/to assign a name, title etc

sentences.english: Lack of knowledge, on the other hand, can be deadly.
sentences.chinese: 另一方面，缺乏知識可能是致命的。

sentences.english: There has always been one major caveat, however, to the research on the fade-out effect.
sentences.chinese: 但是消退效應有一個致命的軟肋。

sentences.english: In 1955, he was hospitalized for a bleeding ulcer which was nearly fatal.
sentences.chinese: 1955年，一場差點致命的嘔血讓他住進醫院。

sentences.english: However, it is that absence of proof that is perhaps most damning.
sentences.chinese: 缺乏實驗證明也許是弦理論最致命之處。

sentences.english: In real life there has been just one fatal space depressurisation accident.
sentences.chinese: 在現實生活中只有一起致命的太空爆發性減壓事故。

sentences.english: The shock was deadly to him.
sentences.chinese: 這次打擊對他是致命的。

sentences.english: Pheromones clearly act as sexual attractants in the animal world.
sentences.chinese: 信息素在動物世界裏是種致命吸引物。

sentences.english: Many of the experiments involved pigs inflicted with near-fatal injuries.
sentences.chinese: 其中諸多實驗包括在豬隻身上施以幾近致命的傷害。

sentences.english: Other marine animals eat the plastic, which can poison them or lead to deadly blockages.
sentences.chinese: 其他海洋動物若吃了塑料，會中毒或導致致命的梗塞。

sentences.english: This is the most fatal and most illogical social perversion that can possibly be imagined.
sentences.chinese: 這是可能想像的最致命和最不合邏輯社會反常。

sentences.english: The witches are deadly nurses and Banquo is assassinated by handgun and silencer.
sentences.chinese: 女巫成了致命的護士，而班柯被消音手槍刺殺。

sentences.english: Spyware is the bane of the home computer user.
sentences.chinese: 間諜軟件是家庭電腦用戶的致命傷害。

sentences.english: This forerunner of the musket is capable of firing deadly volleys that can pierce armour.
sentences.chinese: 這些火槍的先驅者可以射出穿透盔甲的致命齊射。

sentences.english: The fire-safety officer made it pretty clear that could be a fatal mistake.
sentences.chinese: 消防隊員說的非常清楚，那可能是致命的錯誤。

sentences.english: This is both contagious and deadly and must be avoided at all costs.
sentences.chinese: 這會傳染且是致命的，必須不惜一切代價加以避免。

sentences.english: But the lethal creature bobbed off.
sentences.chinese: 好在這些致命生物又遊走了。

definition: to attack/to accuse/to charge/an attack (terrorist or military)
to commit suicide/to have one's life cut short
